items.text: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song.

items.text: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.
items.plainText: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.

items.text: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.
items.plainText: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.

items.text: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
items.plainText: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

items.text: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.
items.plainText: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.

items.text: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
items.plainText: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

items.text: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.
items.plainText: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.

items.text: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
items.plainText: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
